tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SpecialEducationSchedule (
  student_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  session_date DATE NOT NULL,
  therapist_id INT NOT NULL,
  service_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE therapy_sessions (
  session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  student_id INT NOT NULL,
  therapist_id INT NOT NULL,
  session_date DATE,
  session_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE TherapySessions (
    session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    session_date DATE,
    session_time TIME,
    student_id INT,
    therapist_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE Sessions (
    session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME,
    therapist_id INT,
    student_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (therapist_id) REFERENCES Therapists(therapist_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES Students(student_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Services (
    service_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    service_name VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT,
    therapist_id INT,
    student_id INT,
    session_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (therapist_id) REFERENCES Therapists(therapist_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES Students(student_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (session_id) REFERENCES Sessions(session_id)
);

CREATE TABLE students (
	student_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	student_name VARCHAR(50),
	grade_level INT,
	date_of_birth DATE
)

CREATE TABLE therapists (
	therapist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	therapist_name VARCHAR(50),
	specialty VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE therapy_sessions (
	session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	student_id INT,
	therapist_id INT,
	session_date DATE,
	start_time TIME,
	end_time TIME
)

CREATE TABLE support_services (
	service_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	service_name VARCHAR(50),
	service_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE student_services (
	student_id INT,
	service_id INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES students(student_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (service_id) REFERENCES support_services(service_id),
	PRIMARY KEY (student_id, service_id)
)
